title: FYFIT
description1: This was my probably my first real project. Used as personal training app, I always wanted to have a simple way to track my workouts, so I made the perfect app for myself.

title: DARK MINIMALISTIC PORTFOLIO
description1: My previous portfolio features mostly black & white colors.
description2: It also has a light theme version for a better UX - while you scroll down your cursor will snap onto the different sections

title: F-WARE
description1: A script for videogame Rust, it fully or partially removes recoil from guns by moving the players relative mouse position.
description2: It calculates how many rounds each gun shoots per minute, and therefore moves to a certain position on the screen per each bullet. Coded as WindowsConsoleApp in C++
